name: The Escape (itch) (Renderererer)
description:
Please use fullscreen for a better experience.

This game was made in ~12 hours for Discord Jam #5 with the theme: Mutation.  At this point, it's more of a concept than an actual game as I couldn't spend enough time on it.

Game Info:

You have 60 seconds to escape each level.  Adjust the sliders to schedule mutations according to when you might need them.

Mutations:

1) High Jump Force (Red)

2) High Run Speed (Yellow)

3) Acid Resistance (Green)

4) Walk Through Walls (Blue)

Controls:

Left and Right Arrow -> Move.

Up Arrow Key -> Jump

Spacebar -> hold to pass through walls when blue(walk through walls enabled).

Use the mouse to adjust the sliders and press confirm.

Minor Bug Fixes:

- Player velocity resets after each level.

- Screen layout and resolution changed.

* original version with bugs is still available for download.

* no music or sfx added yet.
